body_html: #4139 was a breaking change for .type(args), in particular -1 argument in this line https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/autograd/templates/python_variable_methods.cpp#L631 makes .type(args) calls move tensors to the current gpu, rather than leaving them on the tensor's device. Is it the intended behavior? cc @colesbury
